title: Pair Of Bracelets, ca. 1830
dimensions: L x W (each bracelet): 21.5 x 6.4 cm (8 7/16 x 2 1/2 in.)
creditline: Museum purchase from Decorative Arts Association Acquisition Fund
description: Pair of open ironwork bracelets, each one a wide, flexible, linked band formed of three quatrefoil-and-foliate forms alternating with rosettes, all in the Gothic style; simple rectangular clasp at one end; quatrefoil-and-foliate form with rosette on oval panel at other end, to receive clasp.

exhibitions.title: Faster, Cheaper, Newer, More: The Revolutions of 1848

tombstone.epitaph:
Pair Of Bracelets, ca. 1830.
ca. 1830. Iron. Museum purchase from Decorative Arts Association Acquisition Fund. 1987-84-1-a,b.
